com.bfg.backend

Class SocketHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.web.socket.handler.AbstractWebSocketHandler
      • org.springframework.web.socket.handler.TextWebSocketHandler
        • com.bfg.backend.SocketHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.web.socket.WebSocketHandler

    @Controller
public class SocketHandler
extends org.springframework.web.socket.handler.TextWebSocketHandler
    Handles incoming messages from a client. This can be thought of as the 'main controller' since all communication from the client passes through and is handled here.
    Author:
    emball, jln

      • userQuery

        public void userQuery(org.springframework.web.socket.WebSocketSession session,
                      com.google.gson.JsonObject jsonObj,
                      int type)
        Checks if it is a valid user in the database. Spins up a loginThread to handle database queries.
        Parameters:
        session, - passed to the loginThread so it knows who to send responses to
        jsonObj, - the info to be used in the query
        type, - if it is a login or register query
